HOW TO USE THE CODE IN ROOT

.L bnl_rich_analyzer_pid.cpp++
 eic_bnl_rich *a = new eic_bnl_rich()

How to obtain the relevant results
___________________________________________________________

a->acq("../eval_RICH_e_10k.root",10000,1,0)


where the arguments are:

1: .root file name
2: number of events to be processed <= events in the file
3: 0 (pizel size effects off) , 1 (pizel size effects on 3mm)
4: particle type (0 e, 1 pi , 2 K , 3 p)

The output on the sceen is like this

0  0  0  0  0
0.0343412  0.00136802  3  1  0
0.0334033  0.00188749  30  2  0
0.0333956  0.00157126  28  3  0
0.0334581  0.00146258  28  4  0

0.0334045  0.00128447  29  59  0

Three line in the code can be uncommented to print in the out file


How to reproduce the plots
__________________________________________________________________

Run the simulation for all the particles:

a->acq("../eval_RICH_e_10k.root",10000,1,0)
a->acq("../eval_RICH_pi_10k.root",10000,1,1)
a->acq("../eval_RICH_k_10k.root",10000,1,2)
a->acq("../eval_RICH_p_10k.root",10000,1,3)

and save the outputs in a single file, i.e. pid.txt

Then use the raed funtion:

a->read() \\pid.txt called inside 

3 plots in output
